title: ‘Horner lost political war after creating one-car Red Bull team’
summary: Christian Horner's Red Bull team developed an F1  car that only Max Verstappen can race successfully and now he's had to carry the can, says Karun Chandhok

qa_pairs.question: Which driver is currently the standout performer for Red Bull Racing?
What term describes a team that develops a car primarily suited for one driver's style?
Who is the team principal of Red Bull Racing?
